marklogic.body:
If Obama had a son, he would look like the Multiple shooters in these cases: Google this:
telegraph.co.uk Britons-shot-dead-in-Florida The double-homicide shooting of two white British tourists in Sarasota that was unquestionably â€œracist.â€
The Black Racist Perp frog-marched these two innocent white boys down the street and then executed them.
This article also sheds some light on the phony press spin about Treyvon Martin being only 17 years old and therefore automatically innocent of any wrongdoing. Trayvon Martin was 17, about 6-foot-3 and 150 pounds, in other words, an adult. So why is the media displaying old picture of him when he was maybe 12 and about 5 ft.6inches tall ?
The black teenager, Shawn Tyson, who murdered James Cooper, 25, and James Kouzaris, 24, was already an ex-con and killed them in Cold blood, as they were attempting to flee. They were shot multiple times and left to die in a run down housing project known for drug dealing and gang activity.
If Obama had a son, he would look a lot like Shawn Tyson.
Just in Today: Here is another Obama-Holder-Jackson-Sharpton inspired Murder:
Google this: CDDispatch Mississippi State releases more details on Saturday homicide
A student was shot to death at a Mississippi State University residence Hall late Saturday night. Three African American male suspects reportedly fled the scene in a blue Crown Victoria.
If Obama had a son, he would look a lot like these three murderers.
